pr_title: Add startpage to the Settings Section of a user

timeline.author: linuspahl

timeline.message: Display name of start page on User Details

timeline.bodyText: Right now these selects only have the placeholder 'Select...'.  We could display something like Select type and Select entity.
timeline.author: linuspahl

timeline.bodyText: We could describe here that only entities which are accessible by a user can be defined as a start page. If you think about it, it is legit, but this way we can avoid confusion, especially when an admin edits the settings of an user.
timeline.author: linuspahl

timeline.bodyText: Currently it is possible to define only the type without an entity as the start page and submit the settings. We could add a validate prop for the field, to avoid this case.
timeline.author: linuspahl

replies.bodyText: There is no harm in only selecting a type and I think it is clear that no start page is selected then. So I would not add a validation.
replies.author: kmerz

timeline.bodyText: Whats the reason to not load dashboards and streams at the same time?
timeline.author: linuspahl

replies.bodyText: On request is overriding the other and we and up only having either streams or dashboards but not both 😕 So we need to synchronize the requests
replies.author: kmerz

timeline.message: Make better help texts and place holder

Add startpage to the Settings Section of a user

## Motivation
Prior to this change, there was no way to reset the start page of a
user. A user could only change the startpage to a different stream.

## Description
This change will add a new field to the settings section of a user where
he can edit its startpage.
Display name of start page on User Details
Add waring if a user lost permission for a configured start page
Make better help texts and place holder
Only timeout related settings are permitted to the user
